context_bundle.summary: Silent installation patterns for automated software deployment across Windows, macOS, and Linux platforms without user interaction

onboarding.quick_start: Use /quiet or /silent flags for Windows installers (MSI, Inno, NSIS), installer -pkg for macOS, and package managers for Linux
common_patterns: PowerShell DSC for declarative configuration management
known_errors: NSIS /S flag is case-sensitive (/s will not work)
NSIS /D parameter must be last and unquoted even with spaces
MSI /quiet requires /norestart to prevent automatic reboot
macOS installer requires sudo for system-level installs
